body.description: Razer Gold is the unified virtual credits for gamers worldwide. Use Razer Gold to buy games and in-game content to get more bang for your buck—including getting rewarded with Razer Silver and exclusive game deals.You can make a purchase using Razer Gold in over 2,000 games and entertainment content. Get started by buying Razer Gold today. Each spend in Razer Gold earns you Razer Silver, the only loyalty rewards program for gamers. For use in the United States only. Usage of this card is subject to user’s acceptance of Razer Gold’s Terms of Service and Privacy Policy at gold.razer.com. Compatible software/hardware/internet access required. Risk of loss and title for this card passes to purchaser upon purchase. Razer is not responsible for any loss or damage resulting from lost or stolen cards, or use without permission, or incorrect use. Not for resale. Not redeemable for cash. No refunds or exchanges, except as required by law. Razer and its licensees, affiliates and licensors make no warranties express or implied with respect to this card and disclaim any warranty to the fullest extent available and as permitted by law. Void where prohibited. Content availability and pricing may change. For customer support, visit us at gold.razer.com.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Buying this got my account suspended.
reviews.reviewText: Purchase this with another gift card. I had purchased the wrong gift card to spend that gift card on this. And the result that I got from it was an account suspension and 3 days of other hell dealing with Amazon over it. What was funny was after I had gotten suspension taken care of usually egift cards come in within 5 minutes. Now to my surprise this car did not come in in 5 minutes. I had contacted customer support through the chat and I was told that because of my account issue it would take up to 24 hours for someone to actually review this purchase. I was so flustered by that I called the 800 customer service line and got a completely different story and was told that the chat assistant person was incorrect on the story that they had told me. Quite frankly I find it hard to believe that if a thief were to steal from me that they would be sending it back to me. Laugh all you want but it got my account suspended for 2 days and it took a whole nother day to kind of resolve this stuff on my end and not even a single solitary apology or anything was made right to me in any way shape or form by buying this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Prompt and easy delivery using email only. No hazle like others in CashApp or PayPal. I recommend it and would use it over and over…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn't realize it was American money so it cost me quite a bit Canadian for the exchange rate. I don't see them advertised on here anymore so other people must have had the same problem. But I can't say for sure. Other than it being costly it was fantastic

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Something went wrong when sending this card and the one I was buying it for never received it, not in the inbox, nor the junk/spam folder, nor in the trash. A gift card only has value if it is received. Be WARNED, RAXER GOLD WILL NOT REFUND FOR AN UNRECEIVED GIFT CARD! I spent much time trying to get my money back from Amazon, first, then from Razer Gold. Amazon cannot check the balance of these third party gift cards so they cannot return the money directly to the bank account. If the receiver never receives the card, you will need to talk to an Amazon SUPERVISER. The options are to resend the card, or to have the money refunded to the Amazon account. AMAZON made this right for me when I discussed the problem with a SUPERVISER, but RAZER refused to take responsibility for their own product that they sold to me through Amazon and refund my money. If you want a Gift card, stick to Amazon Gift cards ONLY. At least that way if anything goes wrong Amazon can confirm that the money was not used and can refund it directly to your account!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars make sure you dont send it to yourself
reviews.reviewText: somewhat difficult to use your prime card for purchase resend link impossible to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a gift card what is there to know
reviews.reviewText: Razer cards everybody wants them. I do not know why it's the most coveted card of all the cards out there. But when I asked my girlfriend what kind of gift cards she wants me to send her when I sent her a gift card she tells me razer. And before you ask yes I know who I'm sending it to I know the person it's not a scammer. And I guess I can't review this because it's not giving me the button to submit it so I'll keep talking into this box until it gives me a damn button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars ecard had already been used
reviews.reviewText: This is the second time this has happened both times it has been $100 ecard so it cost me 200 to send 100 for a birthday present. Never buy a razer ecard again for an amount over 25. On SSI don't have much so alot of saving went down the drain because of this and I am not the only one
